name: Vale (Farewell)
description:
E to interact, C to close notes, esc to quit.  The x on note pages doesn't quite work, so you'll have to use C to exit notes.  (Ran out of time on that one, sorry guys!)

First upload on itch, hope I did this right!

A short narrative work with no dialogue set in an abstract representation of the afterlife.

Using assets from Dark Fantasy Studio, SpeedTutor, JustCreate, and rpgwhitelock.  If I missed any others please let me know and I'll update!
